change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 7/2016, effective January 29, 2016.

bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, mutual fund trust means

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: a "mutual fund" as defined in section 1 of the Securities Act organized as a trust,
a "mutual fund trust" as defined in section 132 (6) of the Income Tax Act (Canada), or
a trust that is not yet described by paragraph (b) but is acting in anticipation of making an election described in section 132 (6.1) of the Income Tax Act (Canada).

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Mutual Fund Trustee exemption from section 70 of the Financial Institutions Act

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A corporation is exempt from section 70 of the Financial Institutions Act on condition that

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: it acts as the trustee of a mutual fund trust in British Columbia,
it is the manager, within the meaning of National Instrument 81 - 102, of the mutual fund trust, and

the securities, as defined in section 1 of the Securities Act, of that mutual fund trust are only distributed by means of a prospectus or simplified prospectus for which the executive director, as defined in section 1 of the Securities Act, has issued a receipt under the Securities Act.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A corporation is exempt under subsection (1) only for the purposes of the mutual fund trust described by subsection (1).
